backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining types (User, Role, Status, Task, Layanan) and business logic for user management, service/task workflows, partner assignments, financial calculations, and approval processes with access control integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two user management features: removing manual status filtering in UserManagementPage.tsx and triggering query refetch after approval in UserManagementTable.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of frontend files including components for authentication, registration flows, dashboards, user management, and React Query hooks for backend integration.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind directives defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes with warm off-white backgrounds, midnight slate primary colors, and champagne gold accents.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Work Management Hub application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling authentication flow, superadmin claim, user registration status checks, and role-based routing to appropriate dashboards (Partner, Client, Internal, or Admin) with loading states.
frontend/src/components/ActivateServiceM: Modal component for activating services with client/asistenmu selection via comboboxes, service type dropdown, unit quantity and price inputs, effective hours calculation, and form validation with formatted currency display.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard component that displays pending, approved, and rejected user approvals with actions to approve or reject users. Includes statistics cards, user tables, and integrates with approval management hooks.
frontend/src/components/ApprovalStatusBa: Banner component that displays the current user's approval status (approved, pending, or rejected) with appropriate icons and messaging.
frontend/src/components/ApprovedUserView: Main view component that routes users based on their role and approval status: admins see AdminDashboard, unapproved users see PendingApprovalView, and approved non-admin users see a placeholder dashboard.
Client-specific dashboard showing tasks, active services, and profile management with functionality to create tasks, approve estimates, and update profile information. Includes dialogs for task creation and profile editing.
frontend/src/components/ClientRegisterPa: Client registration page that handles Internet Identity login and collects client information (name, company, phone, email) for registration. Redirects active clients to their dashboard.
frontend/src/components/EditRoleModal.ts: Modal dialog component for admins to update a user's role, displaying current role and providing a dropdown to select from available roles (client, partner, admin, etc.).
frontend/src/components/InternalDashboar: Dashboard for internal users (superadmin, admin, finance, etc.) displaying pending user approval requests with approve/reject actions, user profile dropdown, and conditional access to activate services and manage users based on role permissions.
frontend/src/components/InternalSystemPa: Internal system registration page allowing authenticated users to register with internal roles (admin, finance, concierge, asistenmu, strategic partner) and redirects active internal users to the internal dashboard.
frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page featuring hero section, navigation to partner/client portals, service selection, and WhatsApp contact link with expandable service cards and smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Reusable login/logout button component with Internet Identity integration, supporting default and hero variants with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/PartnerDashboard: Dashboard for partner users displaying profile information (ID, name, city, status) with header navigation and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/PartnerPortalPag: Partner registration portal allowing authenticated users to register as partners with name and city information, redirecting active partners to their dashboard.
frontend/src/components/PendingApprovalV: Displays a pending registration status page for users awaiting admin approval, showing their name and requested role with a clock icon and informational alert.
frontend/src/components/RoleBadge.tsx: Renders a styled badge component for displaying user roles with role-specific colors and labels (superadmin, admin, finance, concierge, asistenmu, client, partner, strategic partner).
frontend/src/components/SuperadminClaimP: Provides a one-time interface for the first authenticated user to claim superadmin privileges, with success/error handling and automatic redirect after claiming.
frontend/src/components/UserInfoPage.tsx: Displays the current user's profile information including name, role, status, and registration timestamp in a card layout with formatted dates and role badges.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementPa: Admin dashboard for managing users with search functionality, statistics cards showing pending/active/total users, and a table displaying both pending and approved users with refresh capabilities.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementTa: Table component for displaying users with approve/reject actions for pending users, role editing for active users, status badges, and copy-to-clipboard for principal IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, handling both anonymous and authenticated states, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApprovalManagement: Provides React Query hooks for managing user approvals including listing approvals, approving/rejecting users, and setting approval status with role assignment.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking for ICP authentication flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching user profiles, roles, approval status, pending requests, and managing user operations like profile updates and user approval/rejection.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegistration.ts: Provides mutation hooks for self-registration of three user types: clients (with company info), partners (with city), and internal users (with role).
frontend/src/hooks/useSuperadminClaim.ts: Implements hooks to check if a superadmin exists in the system and to claim superadmin privileges for the first user.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a premium boutique theme supporting light and dark modes with OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file that defines custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, typography settings with Inter and Cal Sans fonts, custom animations (accordion, fade-in), and extended utilities including shadows and border radius variables.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting known issues with user approval workflow (data sync, approve button, auto-refresh), existing features for user management display and query invalidation, and a pending feature request to fix the approveUser backend function to properly handle role assignment from requestedRole.
